description:
Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they`ll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they`ve made in the last two years!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone Together! Luffy, Setting Out for the New World!
Tout le monde à bord ! Luffy en route pour le Nouveau Monde !
Zen`in Shuugou: Luffy Shinsekai e no Funade
Воссоединение команды! Луффи отправляется в Новый мир!
لمّ شمل الجميع! يبدأ لوفي إبحاره نحو العالم الجديد!
全員集合 ルフィ新世界への船出
